about_the_game:
The Season Two Pack includes all of tables released from Table Pack 11 through Table Pack 20 for a greatly discounted price!

This includes 19 of the greatest pinball tables of all-time!

Dr. Dude And His Excellent Ray™, Firepower™, Cactus Canyon™, Central Park™, White Water™, Space Shuttle™, Centaur™, Pin•Bot™, The Champion Pub™, Whirlwind™, Goin' Nuts™, Flight 2000™, Terminator 2: Judgment Day®, Tee’d Off™, Haunted House™, Victory™, Class of 1812™, El Dorado City of Gold™, and Cue Ball Wizard™ are all included.
detailed_description:
The Season Two Pack includes all of tables released from Table Pack 11 through Table Pack 20 for a greatly discounted price!

This includes 19 of the greatest pinball tables of all-time!

Dr. Dude And His Excellent Ray™, Firepower™, Cactus Canyon™, Central Park™, White Water™, Space Shuttle™, Centaur™, Pin•Bot™, The Champion Pub™, Whirlwind™, Goin' Nuts™, Flight 2000™, Terminator 2: Judgment Day®, Tee’d Off™, Haunted House™, Victory™, Class of 1812™, El Dorado City of Gold™, and Cue Ball Wizard™ are all included.

name: Pinball Arcade: Season Two Table Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 ghz or better.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound capable card.
